title: Milk Junkie: Shimai-hen (Boobalicious)
synopsis: Wataru is a young man who moves into an apartment next to Tomoka and Fumie Fusono, two voluptuous sisters who used to know him when he was a shy child. Now Wataru is all grown up, and the Fusono sisters are ready to take full advantage of that fact.
staff: [['Raika, Ken', ['Director']], ['Nakagawa, Tatsuto', ['Sound Director']], ['Sakisaka, Mamoru', ['Storyboard', ' Key Animation']], ['Tatsunami, Youtoku', ['Original Character Design']]]
